item.title: Fiwix :: your small UNIX-like kernel
item.description: Just install the software and test it. If you encounter any error, please notify it. If you think there are some parts that could be improved, please share your ideas. Fiwix is an open source initiative and is released under the MIT License.

item.title: Prologで学ぶAI手法 – AZ-Prolog
